results.title: Heroes
results.description: The New Mutants meet Team America at a fair, where they are attacked by Viper and the Silver Samurai; Viper captures Psyche and blackmails Team America into stealing a certain object; the New Mutants and Team America join up to go to the rescue.

results.title: Father's Day!
results.description: S'ym, now infected with the transmode virus, challenges Magik; Magik flees to Professor Xavier and updates him on recent events; they rescue the other New Mutants; Cypher figures out a way to defeat Magus; Warlock "adopts" Professor X as his father.

results.title: Teachers' Choice
results.description: Professor X learns the details of the Mutant Massacre, and that his original students have betrayed his dream; after wrestling with competing loyalties, he sends the New Mutants home; meanwhile, Magneto and Storm make an alliance with the Hellfire Club.

results.title: Grounded Forever!
results.description: In a Danger Room scenario, the New Mutants are all massacred by the Marauders; Magneto reprimands them for leaving the school in the midst of the chaos; the New Mutants try to cope with the futures they saw; Magik gives Magneto a tour of Limbo.

results.title: Seduced & Abandoned
results.description: Cypher dreams that he has been infected by the transmode virus (which, in fact, he has); the New Mutants attend a party at the Hellfire Club, where tensions mount; Selene tells Magma they are related; the New Mutants and Hellions agree to a contest.

results.title: Ratrace!
results.description: Karma uses Hellfire Club resources to try to find her missing siblings; the New Mutants and Hellions both try to find the truth about the statue of Selene and Magma's ancestor, and the Hellions win; Karma leaves the New Mutants to search for her siblings.

results.title: Flying Wild!
results.description: The New Mutants attend a party with Lila, where some aliens from Lila's past drug Cannonball and try to get Lila to steal a priceless treasure for them; Magik teleports the villains to Limbo.

results.title: Scavenger Hunt!
results.description: Mirage reveals Magma's heart's desire is Empath; the New Mutants and the Hellions try to catch an escaped creature called Bird Boy; the New Mutants win; Magma decides to transfer to the Massachusetts Academy to learn her true feelings about Empath.

results.title: Birds of a Feather
results.description: The New Mutants try to make Bird Boy comfortable in a Danger Room environment, then try to acclamate him to life in the "real" world; Magma leaves with Emma Frost for the Massachusetts Academy; Cypher begins to communicate with Bird Boy.

results.title: A Bird in the Hand
results.description: The New Mutants learn that Bird Brain comes from the North Atlantic; he dons a New Mutants uniform, then heads back to the North Atlantic, to save his friends from death during their "time of testing"; the New Mutants follow.

results.title: Fang and Claw!
results.description: The New Mutants are watched by the Animator, who created a host of mutated animals, and who works with Cameron Hodge and the Right; Sunspot and Warlock return to the mansion; the Ani-Mator captures the New Mutants, and confronts Bird Brain, his creation.

results.title: Road Warriors!
results.description: Karma tries to gain help from Gen. Coy, her crime-lord uncle; Team America recovers the crystal Viper wants from an AIM fortress in Mexico; the New Mutants rescue Psyche; and a mysterious assailant "claims" Karma, body and soul, forever.

results.title: Suspended Ani-Mation!
results.description: The New Mutants escape, but Cameron Hodge arrives and captures them again; Bird Brain rescues them, defeats the Ani-Mator, and becomes leader of the Ani-Mates; Sunspot and Warlock arrive to help out; Cameron Hodge kills Cypher.

results.title: Our Way!
results.description: The New Mutants leave Bird Brain and the Ani-Mates on the island and return home; they try to begin to cope with Cypher's death; they learn that the X-Men are dead; they confront Magneto and tell him about Cypher; they decide to pick up the X-Men's shoes.

results.title: To Build a Fire
results.description: Magma is called home from the Massachusetts Academy; Emma Frost, eyeing the mineralogical wealth in Nova Roma, sends Empath with her; their plane crashes; they have a series of adventures, in which Magma learns she really does care for Empath.

results.title: Redemption
results.description: Magik has a really bizarre dream, in which she saves the X-Men; she then begins to contemplate going after Forge, whom she believes killed the X-Men.

results.title: Instant Replay!
results.description: Wolfsbane, Magik, and Warlock are still coping with recent deaths; the New Mutants attend Cypher's memorial; Warlock tries to "resurrect" Cypher; the New Mutants bid Cypher farewell; Magik decides to go after Forge, whom she believes killed the X-Men.

results.title: Demons!
results.description: Magik persuades the New Mutants to accompany her on her vendetta against Forge; they arrive in Dallas, and battle Freedom Force; Mirage reveals Destiny's greatest fear: demons from Magik's Limbo overtaking Manhattan; Magik challenges Forge.

results.title: Sorcerer's Duel!
results.description: Magik battles Forge in Dallas, and then in Limbo; Magik's scrying glass is shattered; Magik defeats Forge, and her demons encourage her to kill him; she realizes what she is becoming and lets him go; meanwhile, Spyder sends Gosamyr to reclaim Lila Cheney.

results.title: Promise
results.description: Cannonball promises Magneto that he will not use his powers at Lila's concert; Lila is captured by Spyder's slaves, but Cannonball keeps his promise; Gosamyr offers to help the New Mutants rescue her, in exchange for their help in saving her family.

results.title: Illusion!
results.description: The New Mutants pursue Lila in Gosamyr's ship; Gosamyr plays with the emotions of the New Mutants; Warlock realizes that his teammates act quite out of character in Gosamyr's presence; they try to gain access to Spyder's ship, but are discovered.

results.title: Bad Company
results.description: The New Mutants try to find Lila; Magik realizes Limbo is in revolt against her; Emma Frost summons Magneto to the Hellfire Club; Magik transforms permanently into the Darkchilde; the New Mutants come to understand Gosamyr's power; Spyder captures them.

results.title: Flying Down to Rio!
results.description: Prof. X, suspecting foul play in Karma's disappearance, sends the New Mutants to Rio de Janiero with Sunspot's archaeologist mother, who is captured by the Hellfire Club; the New Mutants rescue her, unaware that Sunspot's father is plotting against her.

results.title: Self-Fulfilling Prophesy
results.description: Something strange is happening in New York City; Gosamyr helps the New Mutants escape; Gosamyr's "family" is revealed; Lila sacrifices herself to save everybody else; Magik teleports the New Mutants and Gosamyr to Limbo, where S'ym now rules supreme.

results.title: Limbo
results.description: The New Mutants battle S'ym in Limbo; they learn about Magik's earlier life in Limbo; N'astirh urges Magik to battle S'ym; Magik defeats S'ym, transforms into a fiery red Darkchilde, and brings the New Mutants to Times Square--along with hordes of demons!

results.title: Demon Reign
results.description: Magik battles N'astirh and S'ym; the New Mutants team up with the X-Terminators to save ten babies that N'astirh is using in an arcane spell; S'ym infects N'astirh with the techno-organic virus; Magik confronts N'astirh and S'ym once more.

results.title: The Gift
results.description: N'astirh tries to stike a deal with Magneto and the Hellfire Club; Magik and Colossus battle S'ym; Wolfsbane helps Magik defeat her dark side; Magik sends the demons and S'ym back to Limbo and seals it shut, but reverts back to a six-year old child.

results.title: The Right Stuff
results.description: Magneto and Sebastian Shaw come to blows; the X-Terminators invite the New Mutants to X-Factor's Ship; Ship freaks out at Gosamyr; she decides to return home; the New Mutants return to their mansion, but are surprised at what they find.

results.title: King of the Hill!
results.description: Magneto, Sebastian Shaw, Selene, and Emma Frost pay the New Mutants a visit; Shaw challenges Magneto's membership in the Inner Circle; the New Mutants are shocked at Magneto's real motives; Shaw is evicted; Magneto and the New Mutants part ways.

results.title: Splash!
results.description: The New Mutants, in search of a home, go to X-Factor's Ship; the X-Terminators find a horn at the bottom of the ocean and blow it; Ship is attacked by an octopus; Sub-Mariner and New Mutants help restore order; X-Factor invites the New Mutants to stay.

results.title: Strange!
results.description: The New Mutants return Illyana to her home in Russia; Hela takes her revenge on Mirage by burning her and Brightwind up with fever; the New Mutants seek help from Doctor Strange; Dani encases herself and Brightwind in ice to ward off the fever.

results.title: Let's Make a Deal!
results.description: Freedom Force, who want Rusty to register in accordance with the Mutant Registration Act, attack the New Mutants; the team splits up, with Skids trying to protect Rusty on Liberty Island; Ship disappears; Dr. Strange transports the New Mutants to Asgard.

results.title: Asgard
results.description: In Asgard, Mirage, who is under Hela's control, flies off on Brightwind to serve her; the New Mutants are captured by dwarves; Cannonball is reunited with their leader, Eitri; Hela sends the Valkyries to attack the New Mutants.

results.title: The Road to . . . Rome?
results.description: The New Mutants and Sunspot's mother, journeying down the Amazon River, are attacked by natives; Cannonball captures one, who turns out to be not what she seems; their ship is destroyed, and they are captured by -- Romans?!?

results.title: Curse of the Valkyries
results.description: The Valkyries capture the New Mutants and the dwarves; the New Mutants escape, but the dwarves are sent into Hel; Hela separates Valhalla from the rest of Asgard; the team is forced to split up; meanwhile, Freedom Force captures Rusty and Skids.

results.title: Faith
results.description: Magma tells Empath about how she met her god: when she once doubted her faith, Hercules visited her, but she did not believe he was real until he saved a boy from a fire and told him stories all night until he died, a hero, like Jason and the Argonauts.

results.title: The Road to Hel . . .
results.description: Cannonball, Rictor, Sunspot, and Wolfsbane are captured; Hela blackmails Eitri into making a sword to kill Odin, who is sleeping the Odin Sleep; Boom Boom, Warlock, and the Wolf Prince get help from Volstagg's children, and are captured by Frost Giants.

results.title: The Quick and the Dead
results.description: Cannonball, Rictor, Sunspot, and Wolfsbane escape; Boom Boom, Warlock, and the Wolf Prince are rescued by Tiwaz; Eitri finishes the sword; Volstagg's children head off to find Balder; meanwhile, Rusty becomes cell-mates with the Vulture.

results.title: The Sword's Edge
results.description: Boom Boom, Warlock, and the Wolf Prince rescue the Warriors Three; Volstagg's children find Balder and Karnilla; Cannonball, Rictor, Sunspot, and Wolfsbane hide in Hela's army; Hela launches her attack; meanwhile, the Vulture and Rusty escape from prison.

results.title: The Killing Stroke
results.description: The combined heroes wage all-out war against Hela and her army; Mirage, still under Hela's power, tries to attack Odin with the sword, but the New Mutants stop her; Hela retreats; Mirage collapses; meanwhile, Rusty frees Skids, and they chase the Vulture.

results.title: Bang! You're Dead!
results.description: The New Mutants regroup in Asgard; Rusty and Skids defeat Vulture and Nitro, but are captured by Freedom Force; the Mutant Liberation Front destroys a federal research facility, then demands that Rusty and Skids be freed, or else they will strike again.

results.title: A Show of Power!
results.description: The Mutant Liberation Front attacks more research stations; Mystique threatens Skids; a federal agent shoots Rusty; he and Skids allow the MLF to rescue them; the New Mutants return to New York; after trying to stop the MLF, Cable weighs his options.

results.title: The Great Escape
results.description: Freedom Force captures Cable, suspecting a connection to the MLF; the New Mutants reunite with X-Factor, and learn about Rusty, Skids, and the MLF; Wolfsbane has an unpleasant confrontation with Moira; Cable escapes Freedom Force's clutches.

results.title: The Gift
results.description: Freedom Force catches up with Cable in New York; the New Mutants arrive on the scene, and decide to defend Cable; Cable promises them that he will find Rusty and Skids; Moira gives Cable her blessing to work with the New Mutants; Rictor remembers Cable.

results.title: Arena
results.description: The New Mutants and Amara are taken to Nova Roma, a hidden city near the headwaters of the Amazon, where they are caught in a power struggle involving Amara's father; the boys are forced to fight in the arena; and Wolfsbane is hailed as a god.

results.title: To Hunt the Hunter
results.description: Caliban stalks Sabretooth in the Morlock tunnels; with X-Factor's blessing, Cable and the New Mutants move into the remains of the X-Men mansion; Rictor gets mad at Cable and heads into the tunnels, where Sabretooth and Caliban confront each other.

results.title: Prey for the Living
results.description: The New Mutants head off to rescue Rictor; they wage a no-holds-barred battle with Sabretooth and Caliban, with Masque as an unwelcome third party; Caliban kills Sabretooth (at least, he thinks he does); Rictor begins to have some respect for Cable.

results.title: When the Carnival Comes To Town
results.description: While training in the Danger Room, Wolfsbane is frightened by a carnival hologram, which reminds her of when the New Mutants visited Cannonball's family in Kentucky and attended a carnival which was in actuality a group of Skrull slavers.

results.title: Madripoor
results.description: Cable and the New Mutants track the Mutant Liberation Front to Madripoor, where they meet up with Sunfire and battle the MLF; Stryfe captures Cannonball, Boom Boom, Warlock, and Sunfire; Cable runs across Wolverine, who recognizes and attacks him.

results.title: Lethal Weapons
results.description: Cable and Wolverine conclude their duel; Cannonball, Boom Boom, Warlock, and Sunfire escape; the New Mutants defeat the MLF, and Cable defeats Stryfe; Cable promises the New Mutants that they will find Rusty and Skids.
